body.title: Red Sparkle Bow Flats - Build-A-Bear Workshop US

description.leadingEquity: Red Sparkle Flats are the pawfect shoe for your stuffed animal's holiday outfit! The teddy bear size Red Sparkle Flats have all-over sparkle and a sweet bow. Pair them with a party dress, leggings or jeans to make a great outfit for your favorite furry friend. Product Details: SKU: 020631
